abstract: In a six-month period from mid-summer to mid-January, government-allied, offshore institutional investors poured more than $40 billion into blue-chip American and European financial institutions, including Barclays, Merrill Lynch, Morgan Stanley and UBS.
lead_paragraph: In a six-month period from mid-summer to mid-January, government-allied, offshore institutional investors poured more than $40 billion into blue-chip American and European financial institutions, including Barclays, Merrill Lynch, Morgan Stanley and UBS.
